findings.title: CVE-2021-44228 - Apache Log4j2 Remote Code Execution (Log4Shell)
findings.description:
Apache Log4j2 <=2.14.1 JNDI features do not protect against attacker controlled LDAP and other JNDI related endpoints. This is the infamous Log4Shell vulnerability.

Package: log4j
Installed: 2.14.0
Fixed: 2.17.0
findings.mitigation: Upgrade log4j to version 2.17.0 or later.

findings.title: CVE-2023-44487 - HTTP/2 Rapid Reset Attack
findings.description:
The HTTP/2 protocol allows a denial of service because request cancellation can reset many streams quickly, causing resource exhaustion.

Package: nghttp2
Installed: 1.43.0
Fixed: 1.57.0
findings.mitigation: Upgrade nghttp2 to version 1.57.0 or later.

findings.title: CVE-2022-29458 - ncurses out-of-bounds read
findings.description:
ncurses before 6.3 has an out-of-bounds read and segmentation violation in convert_strings function.

Package: ncurses
Installed: 6.2
Fixed: 6.3
findings.mitigation: Upgrade ncurses to version 6.3 or later.

findings.title: CVE-2023-4911 - glibc buffer overflow (Looney Tunables)
findings.description:
A buffer overflow was discovered in the GNU C Library's ld.so when parsing the GLIBC_TUNABLES environment variable. Local privilege escalation possible.

Package: glibc
Installed: 2.31-13
Fixed: 2.31-13+deb11u7
findings.mitigation: Upgrade glibc to version 2.31-13+deb11u7 or later.

findings.title: CVE-2022-40674 - Expat use-after-free
findings.description:
libexpat before 2.4.9 has a use-after-free in the doContent function in xmlparse.c.

Package: expat
Installed: 2.2.10-2
Fixed: 2.2.10-2+deb11u5
findings.mitigation: Upgrade expat to version 2.2.10-2+deb11u5 or later.

findings.title: CVE-2022-25883 - semver ReDoS vulnerability
findings.description:
Versions of the semver package before 5.7.2 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS).

Package: semver (npm)
Installed: 5.7.1
Fixed: 5.7.2

findings.title: CVE-2021-33560 - Libgcrypt side-channel attack
findings.description:
Libgcrypt before 1.8.8 has a side-channel attack against ElGamal encryption.

Package: libgcrypt20
Installed: 1.8.7-6
Fixed: 1.8.8-1
findings.mitigation: Upgrade libgcrypt20 to version 1.8.8-1 or later.

findings.title: CVE-2024-4068 - braces memory exhaustion
findings.description:
The NPM package braces fails to limit the number of characters it can handle, which could lead to Memory Exhaustion.

Package: braces (npm)
Installed: 3.0.2
Fixed: 3.0.3
findings.mitigation: Upgrade braces to version 3.0.3 or later.
